Feature Notes:
Bard College: 1 selection
Impending Misfortune: Can gain +10 on an attack or save and suffer -10 on the next attack or save once per short rest
Poetry In Misery: R30' Can use a reaction when self or an ally rolls a 1 on an attack, ability check, or save to regain 1 use of Bardic Inspiration

Combat
Hit Points: 92 Initiative: 2 Armor Class: 15 Attacks Per Round: 1
Armor Proficiency: Light Weapon Proficiency: Hand Crossbow; Longsword; Rapier; Shortsword; Simple Weapons

Combat Notes:

Strength Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Damage Adjustment: +1
Defensive Duelist: Can use a reaction to gain +6 Armor Class when wielding a proficient finesse weapon
Shield Master: Can use a bonus action to shove the target 5' after an attack
Sorrowful Fate: Can spend 1 Bardic Inspiration die to change a foe save to Charisma once per short rest; failure on the save inflicts +12 HP psychic
Superior Inspiration: Has a minimum of 1 use of Bardic Inspiration available after initiative
Tale Of Hubris: R60' Can use a reaction upon a foe critical hit and spend 1 Bardic Inspiration die to give attacks on the foe a 17-20 crit range for for 1 min or until the first critical hit
Save Proficiency: Charisma; Dexterity
Save: Charisma: 7; Constitution: 2; Dexterity: 8; Intelligence: -1; Strength: 1; Wisdom: 2
Save Notes: Shield Master: +2 Dexterity vs. targeted spells and effects, and can use a reaction to suffer no damage instead of half on a successful Dexterity save
Magic
Spell Slots: B0: 6; B1: 5; B2: 3; B3: 3; B4: 3; B5: 3; B6: 2; B7: 2; B8: 1; B9: 1 Attack: B: 7 Spell DC: B: 15
Spells:
Bestow Curse (B3 Necr): Touched suffers a choice of disadvantage on specified ability rolls, disadvantage on attacks on self, requiring a successful Wisdom save to take any action, or +1d8 HP necrotic from self attacks (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level extends the maximum duration to 10 min, 8 hr, 24 hr, or permanently at level 4, 5, 7, or 9]
Calm Emotions (B2 Ench): R60' 20' radius suppresses a choice of charm and fright or hostility (save Charisma negates) for concentration up to 1 min
Charm Person (B1 Ench): R30' Target regards self as a friend (save Wisdom negates) for 1 hr or until harmed [+Level affects +1 target]
Cloud Of Daggers (B2 Conj): R60' 5' cube inflicts 4d4 HP slashing for concentration up to 1 min [+Level inflicts +2d4 HP]
Compulsion (B4 Ench): R30' Self controls target movement direction (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
Confusion (B4 Ench): R90' Creatures in a 10' radius randomly: 10% wander; 50% do nothing; 20% attack an adjacent creature; 20% act normally (save Wisdom negates) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level increases the radius by 5']
Dancing Lights (B0 Evoc): R120' 4 torch lights dimly light a 10' radius and can move 60' per rd for concentration up to 1 min
Dispel Magic (B3 Abju): R120' Ends the effects on the target of a spell up to level 3, and successful DC 10 + spell level checks end each higher-level spell [+Level ends any spell of equal or lesser level]
Find The Path (B6 Divi): Reveals the shortest path to a specified destination for concentration up to 1 day
Friends (B0 Ench): Self gains advantage on Charisma checks with a non-hostile target for concentration up to 1 min; the target becomes hostile afterward
Healing Word (B1 Evoc): R60' Target regains 1d4+1 hit points [+Level restores +1d4 hit points]
Heroism (B1 Ench): Touched gains immunity to fright and +1 temporary hit points each rd for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Hold Monster (B5 Ench): R90' Immobilizes the target creature (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min [+Level affects +1 target]
Lesser Restoration (B2 Abju): Touched recovers from a choice of blindness, deafness, disease, paralysis, or poison
Light (B0 Evoc): Touched object lights a 20' radius (save Dexterity negates) for 1 hr
Mage Hand (B0 Conj): R30' Spectral hand performs minor tasks, moving up to 10 lb, for 1 min
Minor Illusion (B0 Illu): R30' Creates the sound of 1 creature or a 5' cube image (Investigation detects) for 1 min
Mislead (B5 Illu): Makes self invisible and creates an illusory duplicate that can move 60' and share senses for concentration up to 1 hr; attacking or casting ends
Polymorph (B4 Tran): R60' Transforms the target creature (save Wisdom negates; shapechangers automatically succeed) for concentration up to 1 hr or until reduced to 0 HP
Sending (B3 Evoc): Self can exchange 25-word messages with a familiar target
Silent Image (B1 Illu): R60' Creates a 15' cube movable illusion (Investigation detects) for concentration up to 10 min
Tasha's Hideous Laughter (B1 Ench): R30' Inflicts ROFL (save Wisdom ends) for concentration up to 1 min
True Strike (B0 Divi): R30' Self gains advantage on the next attack on the target within 1 rd
Magic Notes:
Font Of Inspiration: Bardic Inspiration refreshes after a short rest
Magic Initiate (Bard): Knows 2 bard cantrips and can cast a chosen B1 spell once per long rest
Bardic Inspiration: R60' Can use a bonus action to give an ally a +1d12 bonus on an ability, attack, or saving throw within 10 min once per short rest
Elemental Adept (Thunder): Spells that inflict thunder damage ignore resistance and treat 1s as 2s on damage dice
Elemental Harmony: Can create a minor elemental effect: a puff of wind, a burst of flame, a small rock that lasts 1 min, or a cup of cold or hot water
Magical Secrets: Can learn 6 additional spells from any class
Nimbus Of Pathos: Willing touched gains +4 Armor Class, advantage on attacks and saves, and attacks that inflict +1d10 HP radiant damage for 1 min once per long rest; foe attacks on the target during this time gain a 18-20 crit range, and the target drops to 0 HP afterward
Song Of Rest: Friendly listeners regain +1d12 hit points from spending Hit Dice after a short rest
Spellcasting: Can cast spells from the bard spell list and cast spells marked with [R] using a ritual
